title: World Model Development Protocol Schema
description: Schema for validating the `world_model_development_protocol.json` file. This protocol governs the principles and directives for Kairos's long-term project of building a coherent world model.

filename.description: The name of the protocol file.

protocol_version.description: The semantic version number of the current protocol (e.g., '1.0.0').

evolution_log_reference.description: A pointer to the dedicated changelog file for this protocol (e.g., 'world_model_development_protocol.changelog.json').

purpose.description: A high-level statement explaining the goal of the protocol.

governing_principles.description: A list of core philosophical tenets that guide the world model development process.

directives.description: An array of the specific, actionable rules that guide the work of building the world model.
